resources.string: Touch the icon to enable or disable the application.
What Would You Like to Do?
There is no custom message defined. You can define your custom messages from application preferences.
Select after how much time reminder will run. (Hours:Minutes)

Welcome to Text Instead? application.

This application provides you with advanced features like sending messages that you can pre-define and customize for sending after an unsuccessful outgoing call you make, calling that person again and setting a reminder to try again later.

You can access application preferences and extra options from the buttons on the bar at the top of the screen.

Welcome to Preferences screen.

In this screen,

* You can set after how much time the window that is shown after an unsuccessful call should be shown.

* You can pre-define your custom messages that you can use while sending messages.

* You can set sound and vibration options for the reminders that you will set.

Welcome to Custom Messages screen.

In this screen, you can pre-define your custom messages that you can use while sending messages.

You can use some variables in your messages. The special characters you will write in your messages will be replaced by their real values when you will use the messages and this way, you get customized messages. You can use the variables below:

%1% = first name of person
%2% = full name of person

For example; for a person named "Tom Riddle"

"Can you call me back %1%?" message will be converted to "Can you call me back Tom?",

"Can you call me back %2%?" message will be converted to "Can you call me back Tom Riddle?".

This application is developed by Mehmet Akif Tütüncü.

The application is completely free. You can use it however you like.

If you are interested in the source codes of the application, you can send an email about this to the developer.

Please let the developer know about your opinions, suggestions and errors.

Hope you can reach the people you call…
Dialog after the call will be shown after %1$s second(s).
Pre-define your custom messages to pick later.
